entry.title: $2300 // ===RENOVATED===2 BEDROOM===PRIME ASTORIA===HARDWOOD
entry.content:
===RENOVATED===2 BEDROOM===PRIME ASTORIA===HARDWOOD

Listing ID #: 169517
Price: $2,300
Property Type: Apartment
Bedrooms: 2.0
Bathrooms: 1.0
Pets: No Pets

Apartment Amenities

Eat In Kitchen
Granite Kitchen
Hardwood
High Ceilings
Light
Marble Bath
Renovated

NEWLY RENOVATED Spacious two bedroom apartment featuring new hardwood flooring and high ceilings throughout. Marble kitchen and deep soaking marble bath with glass sliding shower doors. **HEAT AND HOT WATER INCLUDED** This unit is located in a prime Astoria with everything you need just steps away. Just a short 3 minute walk to the N/W subway lines and just 7 minutes Away from midtown Manhattan. Plenty of Restaurants, supermarkets and coffee shops just steps away. Multiple choices of gyms and banks near by for your convenience. AVAILABLE FOR IMMEDIATE MOVE IN. FOR VIEWINGS CALL or TEXT Mashud Ahmed at 917-355-4162 OR EMAIL [email protected]
